name: konomi
description: Score human faces based on my personal preference

scripts.build: rimraf docs/* && cpx 'data/{tfjs,opencv}/*' docs && parcel build src/index.html --out-dir docs --public-url /konomi && workbox generateSW workbox.config.js
scripts.validate: cpx 'data/images_png_bin/**/*' dist/images_png_bin && parcel build misc/predict.ts && tsc && node misc/validate
scripts.start: rimraf dist/* && cpx 'data/{tfjs,opencv}/*' dist && parcel src/index.html

author: kimamula
